dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3469 IH: To designate the bridge located in Blount County, Tennessee, on the Foothills Parkway (commonly known as “Bridge 2”) as the “Dean Stone Bridge”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duncan of Tennessee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the bridge located in Blount County, Tennessee, on the Foothills Parkway (commonly known as Bridge 2) as the Dean Stone Bridge.

section.text: The bridge located in Blount County, Tennessee, on the Foothills Parkway (commonly known as Bridge 2) shall be known and designated as the Dean Stone Bridge.
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the bridge referred to in section 1 shall be deemed to be a reference to the Dean Stone Bridge.
